reviews.review_msg: Great lecturer, exams are easy if you pay attention in class, uses a lot of anecdotes in teaching which is fun.

I took ARCH105 (online) with David this intersession. There was lots of lecture content (slides, textbook readings, article readings, and movies). The content wasn't too easy/boring but quite interesting and I honestly did not mind lectures/readings/movies. He kept the course quite engaging. I would recommend this course to anyone.
The *stupidest* class I have taken at sfu.  Absolutely useless and completely pointless!  As for Profesor Hayden, I found him to be very arrogant and unhelpful.
Interesting class, good teacher. Inspires interest in his topic.
Interesting course,lots of work, very hard grader. Okay but won't help your GPA.
absoluty phenominal! thinks in a whole new way, demonstrates aboriginial weapons
